statements: DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%'
DELETE FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND dob = '1990-05-15';
DELETE FROM patient_diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_id = 2005 AND severity = 'High';
DELETE FROM treatment_outcomes WHERE outcome_id = 3 AND patient_id = 5;
DELETE FROM diagnoses WHERE patient_id = 10 AND diagnosis_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Diagnoses WHERE date_diagnosed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Monthly' AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM treatment_outcomes WHERE treatment = 'Medication' AND outcome = 'Successful';
